items.name: Old Rusty Key
items.description: A weathered key that looks like it might open something important. Wonder what it unlocks?

items.name: Fresh Bread
items.description: Warm bread from the village bakery. Smells absolutely delicious!

items.name: Mysterious Letter
items.description: A sealed letter addressed to someone in the village. The wax seal bears an unfamiliar crest.

items.name: Wildflower Bouquet
items.description: A lovely bunch of wildflowers picked from the meadow. Would make a nice gift!

items.name: Ancient Coin
items.description: A tarnished coin from a bygone era. It might be valuable to a collector.

items.name: Village Map
items.description: A hand-drawn map of the village and surrounding areas. Very helpful for newcomers!
